title: How to build a home - Quora

response.answer_text: Hire Experienced Construction Manager — Part Time for around $3,000 Per Month. A Construction Manager who is not allowed to bid on any stages so there is no Conflict of Interest. He Needs to get you 3 Things: His prices on Materials, His Prices on Labor and Mange the project to ensure Everything is being done to Code.

The entire process on building a house would take a whole book to describe. Here are two main points to keep in mind: As a novice, your choice of the builder will make all the difference. A good home builder company will guide you through the entire process and make sure you won’t get yourself into too many major issues. Since you’re only building one home, he’s not going to come cheap.Building a home takes a lot more time, effort, and stress than most people think. Prepare for the process to be as involved as a full-time job for up to 18 months. Of course, the less time you put into it, the less satisfied you’ll be with the results, as you won’t be getting exactly what you want.
